1.text: Spray a non-repellent spray on the nest to kill ants at the source.

2.text: Apply the pesticide around your home to stop them from coming inside.

3.text: Spread granular pesticide across your lawn for larger infestations.

4.text: Use bait traps near your home for hands-off pest control.

5.text: Pour soapy water into the anthill for a safe solution.

6.text: Spray boric acid onto the nests to kill them within a few days.

7.text: Sprinkle diatomaceous earth around the anthill to dry out the infestation.

8.text: Make a repellent spray with orange peels and vinegar to steer ants away.

9.text: Pour glue directly into the anthill to plug up the opening.

10.text: Sprinkle baby powder around the nests to keep ants away from an area.

11.text: Rub essential oils on any points of entry to keep ants out.
